utterances: Why should I be interested in Aidan as a job candidate?
answers: Of course! Almost 2 years ago Aidan graduated from a web development certificate program at BrainStation. Shortly after that he did freelance work on Upwork. Eventually, he accepted a full-time position at Digital Strata, where he is currently employed as a web developer. He is now a founder at VVibrant Web Solutions.
I currently work at a company called Digital Strata as a full-stack web developer.
My current job is at Digital Strata as a web developer.

utterances: How much experience do you have?
answers: As a web developer, around 2 years, as a yo-yoer, around 6 months. I'm better at one than the other :)
Aidan has worked as a software developer around 2 years. I also put hours into side projects in order to hone my skills. See my GitHub for more details.

utterances: where did he go to school
answers: BrainStation is a coding bootcamp that teaches students a variety of skills. Aidan graduated from the web development certificate program.
Upwork is a freelancing platform that allows people to find work and hire freelancers.
Digital Strata is a digital forensics agency that specializes in web development and forensic collections on digital devices.
VVibrant Web Solutions is a web development/design agency that specializes in web services for the psychedelic therapy industry in Oregon.
